entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
